siteMetadata.title: Aaron Van Bokhoven - Software Developer
siteMetadata.subtitle: Software developer working with Ruby, Go, and JavaScript. Hobbyist street photographer and climber.

frontmatter.title: Moving from Linode to Heroku
frontmatter.description: The last time I checked out Heroku was about 2 years ago, which I later dismissed because at the time it seemed like having your own VPS was the right thing to do.

frontmatter.title: Setting up an Ubuntu server with Ruby 1.9.2 and Rails 3.1
frontmatter.description: I just recently fired up a new Linode VPS, with Ubuntu 10.04 LTS, to stage a Ruby on Rails 3.1 app running Ruby 1.9.2 and I thought I would share my process.
